p: Ginger ( Zingiber officinale Roscoe) is an important tropical valued medicinal herb that is found globally as a spice and used for healing and therapeutic proposes. Ginger belongs to the Zingiberaceae family which has been reported to contain over 1250 species in fifty genera, together with 4 other families which is positioned in the order Zingiberales and class Monocotyledones ( Berg, 1997). They have been reported to have many vital pharmacological actions to treat various types of diseases by the actions of antiemetic, antioxidant, anti-cancer, anticoagulant property, anti-inflammatory, and soon. clinical studies have documented its efficacy in treatment of post-operative vomiting and vomiting of pregnancy.
